body: Ok so I haven't really done any PvP since 1.6/1.7 I'm not used to this much knockback. How does one get it so you can hit someone from 5 blocks away but they cant hit you. I've died maybe 10 times in a row due to this knockback and can't figure it out. Is there also anything else you may recommend?

title: Little help?

replies.body: When they get you in a chain of hits, it makes it close to impossible to hit them at some points. That's when you either 1. Run 2. Hit with rod or boe 3. Somehow break the combo 4. Accept your fate
